entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: ESE 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
